article.title: Joint Venture Awarded Contract for Javelin Weapon System
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: The U.S. Army has awarded a joint venture by the Raytheon Company and Lockheed Martin a $214 million contract for production of the Javelin Close Combat Weapons System. The Javelin Joint Venture will produce the Javelin missile and command launch units and will provide training and field support.
